name: Immigration Center For Women and Children
description: Immigration Center for Women & Children (ICWC) strives to provide security and stability for children who are abused, abandoned or neglected and for immigrants who are victims of domestic violence, sexual assault, and other violent crimes by providing free and affordable immigration services to underrepresented immigrants. Eligibility Requirements: - The person who wants to apply for a petition must provide proof that they are a spouse, child (not married and under 21 years old) or the parent of
